item.title: 萨默斯称米兰发表了记忆中最软弱的美联储理事讲话
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）对斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）作为美联储理事发表的首次讲话进行了抨击，称其未能为削减利率提供适当的分析依据。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers blasted Stephen Miran’s first speech as Federal Reserve governor, saying it failed to provide a proper analytical basis for slashing interest rates.】

item.title: 能源转让公司与 EIG 旗下 MidOcean 公司接近敲定美国液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，能源转运公司（Energy Transfer LP）即将达成协议，向投资公司 EIG Global Energy Partners 旗下子公司 MidOcean Energy 出售其计划中的路易斯安那州查尔斯湖出口终端的液化天然气。【原文：Energy Transfer LP is nearing an agreement to sell liquefied natural gas from its planned Lake Charles export terminal in Louisiana to MidOcean Energy, a subsidiary of investment firm EIG Global Energy Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的 RSA Security 与债权人恢复债务谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Clearlake Capital Group 支持的 RSA Security 公司已恢复与部分贷款人就债务问题进行讨论，而今年早些时候谈判曾一度降温。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group-backed RSA Security has resumed discussions with some of its lenders over its debt, after talks cooled off earlier this year, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行在消费强劲的情况下权衡 9 月暂停的影响
item.description: 在贸易不确定性和消费强劲的情况下，加拿大央行曾考虑在 9 月份维持利率稳定，但考虑到经济疲软和核心通胀趋缓的迹象，最终选择了降息。【原文：The Bank of Canada considered holding interest rates steady in September amid trade uncertainty and stronger consumption, but opted to cut given signs of a weakening economy and tamer core inflation.】

item.title: Roblox 对 "敏感 "游戏的限制受到权益组织的批评
item.description: Roblox 公司正面临三个倡导团体的批评，它们认为，在儿童玩涉及婚姻平等和体育运动中薪酬公平等 "敏感问题 "的游戏之前，必须征得家长的同意，这将弊大于利。【原文：Roblox Corp. is facing criticism from three advocacy groups who say the parental approval required before children can play games involving “sensitive issues” like marriage equality and pay equity in sports will cause more harm than good.】

item.title: 据说德国西门子正在研究分拆 Healthineers 股份

item.title: 伦敦证交所首席执行官霍格特称，泛欧交易所合并后，伦敦证交所不会出售

item.title: Cucinelli 确认增长目标，拒绝 "卖空 "说法
item.description: 布鲁内罗-库奇内利公司（Brunello Cucinelli SpA）确认了其全年增长目标，因为对该公司奢华羊绒制品的持续需求使其前九个月的销售额跃升了11%。这家意大利时装集团驳斥了做空者提出的导致其股价出现有史以来最大跌幅的说法。【原文：Brunello Cucinelli SpA confirmed its target for full-year growth as sales jumped by 11% in the first nine months on continued demand for the company’s luxury cashmere products. item.title: First Brands 贷款人出资 44 亿美元避免清算
item.description: 据法庭文件显示，First Brands Group LLC 的众多贷款人 "以迅雷不及掩耳之势 "提供了 44 亿美元的破产保护融资，公司顾问称，这将使这家汽车零部件供应商在匆忙申请破产后避免清算。【原文：A broad group of First Brands Group LLC lenders “have worked at lightening-speed” to provide $4.4 billion of Chapter 11 financing that company advisers said will allow the auto-parts supplier to avoid liquidation after its rushed bankruptcy filing, according to court papers.】

item.title: 欧洲检察官调查北方数据公司 5 亿欧元收购 GPU 案

item.title: 法国电力创二十年新低，冬季来临前供应充足
